title: The Consequences of nuclear war
creator_credit: Ross Christopher and Australian National University
brief_description: Highlights of a conference, with the same name as the title, which was held at the Australian National University. The papers dealt with various aspects of the nuclear arms race and were presented by a range of Australian and international speakers.
